content.question: In the fourth sentence of the last paragraph (“Even today . . . colleague”), the author alludes to his experiences at social functions primarily to

choices.label: suggest that he finds assimilation more difficult in adult life than he did in college
question the extent to which he has succeeded in achieving his stated goal of assimilation
offer evidence to support his larger argument about the benefits of assimilation
imply that most of his colleagues are unfamiliar with Asian social customs

content.answer: question the extent to which he has succeeded in achieving his stated goal of assimilation

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
